record.id: fileName="requestModel" and number="Avery Restroom - Restock-Repair Bundle"

tasks.activeCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand dataType="useroption" type="useroption"><UserOptionName caption="Bathroom Gender">Bathroom Gender</UserOptionName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Men's</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand dataType="useroption" type="useroption"><UserOptionName caption="Men's item requiring attention:">Men's item requiring attention:</UserOptionName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Paper Towels</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand dataType="useroption" type="useroption"><UserOptionName caption="Paper Towel Action:">Paper Towel Action:</UserOptionName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Restock</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
tasks.activeCondDesc: ( User Option Bathroom Gender = "Men's" AND User Option Men's item requiring attention: = "Paper Towels" AND User Option Paper Towel Action: = "Restock")

tasks.activeCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand dataType="useroption" type="useroption"><UserOptionName caption="Bathroom Gender:">Bathroom Gender:</UserOptionName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Men's</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand dataType="useroption" type="useroption"><UserOptionName caption="Men's item requiring attention:">Men's item requiring attention:</UserOptionName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Paper Towels</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand dataType="useroption" type="useroption"><UserOptionName caption="Paper Towel Action:">Paper Towel Action:</UserOptionName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Repair Despenser</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
